Package pt.up.fe.pe25.task.notification.plugins

package pt.up.fe.pe25.task.notification.plugins

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    PluginDecorator
    A plugin decorator
    It is used to decorate a notification service with additional functionality
    It is used in the MailPlugin to send notifications by email
    It is used in the MsTeamsPlugin to send notifications by webhook in ms teams
    It is used in the WhatsAppPlugin to send notifications by whatsapp
    It is used in the TwilioSMSPlugin to send notifications by sms
    It is used in the TwilioCallPlugin to send notifications by voice
    It is used in the SmsPlugin to send notifications by sms using a smpp server
